title: Kogito Serverless Workflows at OpenShift Commons Briefing
content: Last Monday, we gave a brief overview of the Kogito implementation of the , named Serverless Workflows, at . You can watch the recorded presentation here:    Highlights:   * Introduction to the CNCF Serverless Workflows  * Overview of the Kogito Project  * Event-Driven Applications Use Case Example  * Kogito deployment model on OpenShift  * Knative infrastructure  * Short Demonstration  * Q&A  You can find the full example that we showcased in this presentation at our . Try it locally and give us your feedback!  The post appeared first on .
